select
distinct
from JEDA_USER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into JEDA_USER (USER_ID, POSITION_ID, ORG_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_ID_NO, USER_GENDER, USER_EMAIL, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_ADDRESS, USER_POST, USER_TEL, USER_MOBILE, USER_DESCRIPTION, USER_ENABLED, USER_LOCKED, USER_ACCOUNT_NONEXPIRED, USER_ACCOUNT_NONLOCKED, USER_CREDENTIALS_NONEXPIRED, USER_ORDER, USER_VERSION, USER_CREATOR, USER_CREATED, USER_MODIFIER, USER_MODIFIED, ADDVCD, VISITS, LOGIN_TIME, LOGIN_NAME) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEnabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userLocked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userAccountNonexpired,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userAccountNonlocked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userCredentialsNonexpired,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addvcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visits,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
